New backup system: dmcrypt + luks + btrfs + btrbk -> incremental encrypted backups.
Now I don't care if someone steals a backup HDD.

@Icetigris but, while always a threat, fascism hasn't infected local or national government to my knowledge.

@adastley mprotect is very os specific. And my code would be cleaner without it. Maybe something for sewing v2.
@adastley I was thinking of changing my api to have a stack malloc callback, so the user can worry about mprotect instead of me.
@adastley Have a define specifying alignment for the stack. I set to 4096 bytes for memory protection prerequisite. Can differ between OSs.
